mapper.select:
SELECT comm_dtl_nm, comm_dtl_cd FROM common_detail
WHERE UPPER(comm_cd) = UPPER(#{commCd})
ORDER BY comm_dtl_cd

SELECT entrprs_mber_id, cmpny_nm, bizrno, cxfc, zip, area_no, entrprs_middle_telno, entrprs_end_telno, fxnum, update_id, update_dt, create_id, create_dt, del_yn FROM comtnentrprsmber ORDER BY create_dt desc
